addRewardWithPermit(uint256,address,uint.details: This function prevents reentrancy by updating the state before transferring tokens.

params.claimAfterBlocks: The number of blocks after which the reward can be claimed.
params.deadline: The time by which the permit must be used before it expires.
params.isForERC721Stakers: A boolean to indicate if the reward is for ERC721 stakers (true) or ERC20 stakers (false).
params.max: A boolean to indicate if the maximum amount of tokens should be approved (true) or the specified amount (false).
params.poolId: The ID of the pool to which the reward will be added.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.rewardAmount: The amount of the reward token to be added.
params.rewardToken: The token that will be used for the reward.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

calculateReward(address,uint256,uint256).details: This function is an external wrapper around `_calculateReward`,      necessary for try/catch in `getReward`.

params.rewardId: The ID of the reward within the pool.

returns._0: token The ERC20 token in which the reward is denominated.
returns._1: amount The amount of reward the staker is eligible to claim.

params.poolId: The ID of the pool to retrieve information for.

returns.poolDetails: Detailed information about the pool specific to the staker.

params.poolId: The ID of the pool to retrieve.

returns.poolDetails: The details of the specified pool.

params.poolId: The ID of the pool containing the reward.
params.rewardId: The ID of the reward within the pool.

returns.rewardDetails: Detailed information about the reward specific to the staker.

params.poolId: The ID of the pool containing the reward.
params.rewardId: The ID of the reward within the specified pool.

returns.rewardDetails: The details of the specified reward.

returns._0: _ An array of rewards for the specified pool.

params.stakeId: The ID of the specific stake within the pool.

returns._0: _ An array of stakes by the staker in the pool.

stakeWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: This function uses the nonReentrant modifier from OpenZeppelin to prevent reentrancy attacks.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake in the pool.
params.deadline: The time by which the permit must be used before it expires. This is typically a timestamp.
params.max: If set to true, the permit will approve the maximum uint256 value, allowing unlimited transfers.             If false, the permit will only approve the specified amount.
params.poolId: The ID of the pool in which to stake tokens.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair, specifically the first 32 bytes.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair, specifically the second 32 bytes.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature, part of the ECDSA signature components.

addRewardWithPermit(uint256,address,uint.notice: Adds a reward to a pool with a permit, allowing the sender to approve and add a reward in a single transaction.

calculateReward(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the reward for a staker in a given pool.

getPool(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves pool details for a specific staker by pool ID.

getPool(uint256).notice: Retrieves details of a specific pool by its ID.

getReward(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves reward details for a specific staker in a given pool.

getReward(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves details of a specific reward in a pool.

getRewards(uint256).notice: Retrieves rewards associated with a specific pool.

getStake(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves details of a specific stake a user has in a pool.

getStakes(address,uint256).notice: Fetches stakes for a given staker in a specific pool.

getTotalPools().notice: Retrieves the total number of pools.

stakeWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Stakes tokens in a pool with a permit, combining ERC20 token approval and staking in a single transaction.
